quotes.quote: Forgiveness is the fragrance that the violet sheds on the heel that has crushed it.

quotes.quote: The wound is the place where the Light enters you.

quotes.quote: Out of suffering have emerged the strongest souls; the most massive characters are seared with scars.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Love is the bridge between you and everything.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: The heart has its reasons which reason knows nothing of.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The only person you should try to be better than is the person you were yesterday.

quotes.quote: Breathe. Let go. And remind yourself that this very moment is the only one you know you have for sure.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: The greatest wealth is a peaceful mind.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Slow down. Breathe. You are exactly where you need to be.

quotes.author: Pema Chödrön
